abstract: Some neighborhoods in northern Manhattan have residents at opposite ends of the income scale, according to the Census Bureau.
snippet: Some neighborhoods in northern Manhattan have residents at opposite ends of the income scale, according to the Census Bureau.
lead_paragraph: Income inequality is greater in New York State and in the New York City region than in any other state or metropolitan area in the country, according to the Census Bureau.

headline.main: Income Disparity Is Greatest in New York, Census Finds
